dc_title_s: Country bordering the Great Trunk Road between Benares and Dehli : complied from the Revenue Surveys, based on the Great Trigonometrical Operations, 1857
dc_description_s: Extracted from an unfinished map of the N W Provinces under compilation in the Surveyor General's Office Calcutta December 1857.|color ;|Scale 1:506,880.  "Scale 8 miles = 1 inch"|Ames Library of South Asia Maps
